LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: ――That name, how did Hiragino...?

LABEL: 0x2F0
STRING: Had I said it somewhere?

LABEL: 0x316
STRING: Or had he seen it written on something?

LABEL: 0x34A
STRING: ――No.

LABEL: 0x362
STRING: The data should have been perfectly fabricated.

LABEL: 0x394
STRING: Then where――?

LABEL: 0x3B4
STRING: During the split second I was contemplating various possibilities, my gaze remained fixed on Hiragino and Yukari.

LABEL: 0x476
STRING: 「――By any chance...」

LABEL: 0x496
STRING: 「Did you have a sister... who died seven years ago?」

LABEL: 0x535
STRING: 「Hitose... Katagiri Hitose...」

LABEL: 0x57B
STRING: 「A coincidence like that would be...」

LABEL: 0x59D
STRING: 「She was always talking about her brother...」

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: 「Hitoha... You're her...」

LABEL: 0x66A
STRING: 「...Brother?」

LABEL: 0x689
STRING: Yukari was muttering to herself.

LABEL: 0x6B1
STRING: I didn't know what she knew and to what extent.

LABEL: 0x6ED
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x707
STRING: ...I heard those words loud and clear.

LABEL: 0x73F
STRING: Why did Yukari...%NKnow my sister's%R(7,・・ ・・・・・・) name?

LABEL: 0x7E3
STRING: Even if she didn't know about the accident firsthand... if she knew my sister――

LABEL: 0x83F
STRING: ――There was a mountain of questions I had for her.

LABEL: 0x88B
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x970
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei, how do you know that name...?」

LABEL: 0x9A9
STRING: She asked Hiragino in a harsh tone.

LABEL: 0x9DB
STRING: Yes, he should've had nothing to do with the accident seven years ago. So how could he have――

LABEL: 0xA93
STRING: 「So it was yours.」

LABEL: 0xABC
STRING: Hiragino smiled and put his hand in the pocket of his lab coat.

LABEL: 0xAFC
STRING: What he took out was a shiny silver chain.

LABEL: 0xB2E
STRING: That was――

LABEL: 0xB55
STRING: 「I picked this up yesterday off the floor in the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0xBCA
STRING: A small medal was on the end of the chain.

LABEL: 0xBFC
STRING: It was a pendant featuring an old British silver coin.

LABEL: 0xC38
STRING: Hiragino gently turned the plate over in the palm of his hand.

LABEL: 0xC78
STRING: The words "To Hitose" were engraved there.

LABEL: 0xCB5
STRING: I'd gone through the trouble of retrieving it from my own luggage in the rear section yesterday.

LABEL: 0xCFF
STRING: I hadn't had time to wear it and had left it in my pocket, but I didn't realize I'd dropped it in the emergency room...

LABEL: 0xDCD
STRING: 「――And that's why.」

LABEL: 0xDF1
STRING: 「It wasn't that big of a stretch, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0xE3C
STRING: His mischievous grin made the doubting expressions of the women watching him stand out even more.

LABEL: 0xE9A
STRING: The pendant swung in Hiragino's hand.

LABEL: 0xEC4
STRING: 「...Do you enjoy making fun of people?」

LABEL: 0xEF6
STRING: ――I was surprised at the harshness of the words that finally came out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0xF3E
STRING: I wasn't in a position to say things like that―I knew that, but...

LABEL: 0xF96
STRING: 「I can't believe you didn't tell me I'd dropped it and kept it yourself...」

LABEL: 0xFE4
STRING: 「Why did you do that?」

LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: 「I meant no offense.」

LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: 「I was going to give it to you right away, but, you see, the name caught my attention.」

LABEL: 0x10F5
STRING: 「So, you led me on...?」

LABEL: 0x118F
STRING: 「I didn't mean it that way, but...」

LABEL: 0x11BD
STRING: 「I was kind of curious.」

LABEL: 0x11EB
STRING: 「You were strangely slow to respond to being called and referred to your own name as if it were a stranger's...」

LABEL: 0x124F
STRING: 「I was thinking that you had some ulterior motive, and when I saw this pendant, I was convinced.」

LABEL: 0x12AE
STRING: 「...I see.」

LABEL: 0x12E6
STRING: I thought I was doing well and didn't realize that I was acting so out of place.

LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: I hadn't gotten used to my false name...

LABEL: 0x13B8
STRING: At that moment, it was Touri who raised her voice.

LABEL: 0x1454
STRING: 「Hey, what do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x1482
STRING: 「лл-san...」

LABEL: 0x14FD
STRING: 「I mean, Katagiri-san is your real name?」

LABEL: 0x1535
STRING: 「It's... not a joke, is it?」

LABEL: 0x1563
STRING: 「What is this...?」

LABEL: 0x15B6
STRING: Touri was visibly confused.

LABEL: 0x15E2
STRING: I understood that she didn't get what was going on, but――

LABEL: 0x163A
STRING: She,

LABEL: 0x1650
STRING: this girl who knew nothing,

LABEL: 0x1672
STRING: was purely a victim of mine.

LABEL: 0x1698
STRING: 「No, I mean... I don't even know where to start.」

LABEL: 0x16C8
STRING: 「It's a misunderstanding...」

LABEL: 0x16E2
STRING: 「No, not a misunderstanding, but...」

LABEL: 0x1780
STRING: 「Why did you deceive us?」

LABEL: 0x17B5
STRING: She should've just screamed in anger.

LABEL: 0x17E7
STRING: Her voice was cold.

LABEL: 0x1823
STRING: Yes.

LABEL: 0x1839
STRING: I was deceiving you.

LABEL: 0x185F
STRING: And I couldn't even reveal why.

LABEL: 0x18EA
STRING: I was the worst.

LABEL: 0x1900
STRING: I didn't mean to provoke Touri in this way.

LABEL: 0x193E
STRING: Why didn't I tell them sooner...?

LABEL: 0x19CF
STRING: I looked away without a word, but Yukari's stare shot through me.

LABEL: 0x1A77
STRING: 「Why do you have... that pendant?」

LABEL: 0x1B1C
STRING: 「Don't tell me that you really...」

LABEL: 0x1B9F
STRING: 「――Show me proof.」

LABEL: 0x1BC5
STRING: 「If you really are her brother...」

LABEL: 0x1BFD
STRING: 「Present something, anything, that can be used as proof. Otherwise, I won't believe you.」

LABEL: 0x1C4B
STRING: 「There's no guarantee that this name isn't another alias.」

LABEL: 0x1C96
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0x1CB0
STRING: I certainly didn't have any credibility right now.

LABEL: 0x1CE6
STRING: Even though I deserved it, I felt frustrated by the fact that none of my words would be believed.

LABEL: 0x1DC8
STRING: 「Hey now, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x1DE8
STRING: 「We won't get anywhere if you're that skeptical.」

LABEL: 0x1E8C
STRING: 「Who's skeptical?」

LABEL: 0x1EB7
STRING: Hiragino tried to interrupt her, but she just brushed him off.

LABEL: 0x1EFE
STRING: 「You're too lenient, sensei.」

LABEL: 0x1F1E
STRING: 「How can you trust his word when he has lied to you not once, but twice?」

LABEL: 0x1FDA
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x1FFB
STRING: That... was a good point.

LABEL: 0x201B
STRING: It was too much to ask for them to believe my words like before.

LABEL: 0x2080
STRING: 「And you being you...」

LABEL: 0x20FD
STRING: 「Why didn't you report it to me when you noticed something suspicious about him?!」

LABEL: 0x2195
STRING: 「I'm in charge of this ship!」

LABEL: 0x21BF
STRING: 「We're in a state of emergency, so why don't you keep me informed?!」

LABEL: 0x21FD
STRING: 「Why are you making decisions on your own?!」

LABEL: 0x222D
STRING: 「Are you saying that I'm not good enough?!」

LABEL: 0x22BE
STRING: 「I was selected to be the person responsible for this ship!」

LABEL: 0x22F6
STRING: 「And I possess the ability and achievements required for it!」

LABEL: 0x2399
STRING: 「You can't treat me like I'm unqualified forever!」

LABEL: 0x2412
STRING: Yukari shouted wildly in anger.

LABEL: 0x243C
STRING: She looked... tragic.

LABEL: 0x2462
STRING: Like a selfish child.

LABEL: 0x248A
STRING: She suddenly shook her head.

LABEL: 0x2522
STRING: 「In any case―I don't trust him.」

LABEL: 0x2575
STRING: Yukari gave me a distinctly hostile look.

LABEL: 0x2623
STRING: 「I'll be looking into you.」

LABEL: 0x26A6
STRING: 「――Thoroughly.」

LABEL: 0x26C9
STRING: She drew near me menacingly.

LABEL: 0x26F9
STRING: I understood her anger.

LABEL: 0x2739
STRING: For someone who had to know everything,

LABEL: 0x276D
STRING: I could only imagine how humiliated and inhibited she must've felt in this position.

LABEL: 0x27DF
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0x27FD
STRING: 「What you're saying is reasonable, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x2831
STRING: 「You can look all you want until you're satisfied.」

LABEL: 0x286B
STRING: 「But, just this once, please trust me.」

LABEL: 0x289F
STRING: I bowed deeply.

LABEL: 0x2958
STRING: Unable to say anything, she clenched her fists.

LABEL: 0x299E
STRING: Hiragino put his hand on her shoulder.

LABEL: 0x2A99
STRING: 「Well, let's calm down first.」

LABEL: 0x2AB7
STRING: 「We have better things to do than blame others―or ourselves.」

LABEL: 0x2B02
STRING: And when he turned to face me――

LABEL: 0x2B37
STRING: 「You... Why did you use a fake name in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x2B8A
STRING: 「――That's right.」

LABEL: 0x2BE5
STRING: Suddenly―or as always...

LABEL: 0x2C13
STRING: Without warning, Tokiwa interjected.

LABEL: 0x2C47
STRING: Not only me, but everyone present looked back at her.

LABEL: 0x2CE4
STRING: 「Tokiwa――?」

LABEL: 0x2D02
STRING: Her eyes were sharp.

LABEL: 0x2D1C
STRING: A strong gaze as if appealing for something.

LABEL: 0x2D48
STRING: I had never seen Tokiwa's face like that before.

LABEL: 0x2D7E
STRING: Slowly, she spoke up...

LABEL: 0x2DB7
STRING: 「That isn't right.」

LABEL: 0x2DD7
STRING: 「You absolutely can't do that.」

LABEL: 0x2E18
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x2E36
STRING: 「I didn't mean to...」

LABEL: 0x2E70
STRING: No matter what words I used, I couldn't help but feel that I was acting suspicious.

LABEL: 0x2ECC
STRING: As I was at a loss for words again, Touri quickly offered me something.

LABEL: 0x2F10
STRING: This... this is my keycard that I gave her when she said she was going to see Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2FCC
STRING: 「...Um, Katagiri-san, right?」

LABEL: 0x3005
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x301B
STRING: 「You may not believe me, but...」

LABEL: 0x3062
STRING: 「But, this card still says лл-san...」

LABEL: 0x30A7
STRING: As Touri pointed out, the name лл was written there.

LABEL: 0x3123
STRING: 「That's who it was for.」

LABEL: 0x31B5
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x31DC
STRING: 「The passengers here were randomly selected by the organizers.」

LABEL: 0x321E
STRING: 「But I... didn't make the cut.」

LABEL: 0x3250
STRING: 「So, I asked a friend who got a boarding ticket to give it to me...」

LABEL: 0x32AA
STRING: 「лл is their name.」

LABEL: 0x32DA
STRING: I explained it concisely.

LABEL: 0x32FC
STRING: The truth was that there was more to it, but that was a trivial matter now.

LABEL: 0x33C2
STRING: 「So... you were pretending to be your friend?」

LABEL: 0x340B
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x343F
STRING: The keycard was engraved with the name of the passenger it belonged to.

LABEL: 0x347B
STRING: If I used my real name, it would raise suspicion if they noticed the discrepancy between the name on the card and my name.

LABEL: 0x34E7
STRING: If that happened, I'd have no excuse. In fact, there would be no justification whatsoever.

LABEL: 0x354D
STRING: And, in the midst of all this chaos, I didn't want to raise suspicion...

LABEL: 0x3591
STRING: So I ended up giving them my false name.

LABEL: 0x35C1
STRING: I had no idea this was going to happen as a result.

LABEL: 0x365D
STRING: 「...I see. I understand your reasoning.」

LABEL: 0x36F2
STRING: 「However.」

LABEL: 0x3767
STRING: 「If you had just explained this to us before, we wouldn't have to go through this questioning, would we?」

LABEL: 0x37C9
STRING: 「You've lost our trust.」

LABEL: 0x37FE
STRING: Yukari was right.

LABEL: 0x381C
STRING: I bowed my head once more.

LABEL: 0x3842
STRING: 「I'm sorry. For not coming forward with it.」

LABEL: 0x3872
STRING: 「I even manipulated the data to mask my identity...」

LABEL: 0x38B6
STRING: Even if I gave my real name and explained the situation, it wouldn't exempt me from being treated like a culprit.

LABEL: 0x3900
STRING: If that happened, I'd never be able to achieve my original goal―to search for clues left behind in these waters.

LABEL: 0x3970
STRING: Before all these accidents, that was my original purpose―I now found myself thinking back to it.

LABEL: 0x39CA
STRING: But I didn't know back then.

LABEL: 0x39FC
STRING: The horrors that this ship would be involved in. The lives that would be lost.

LABEL: 0x3A40
STRING: I had been too optimistic.

LABEL: 0x3A68
STRING: Right after the accident, I had thought――

LABEL: 0x3A8E
STRING: ――"I'm not sure what happened, but this is still a favorable situation."

LABEL: 0x3ADA
STRING: That was what I had thought. That fact couldn't be erased.

LABEL: 0x3B73
STRING: Yukari looked away, astonished.

LABEL: 0x3BAE
STRING: 「...Haah. That's enough.」

LABEL: 0x3C33
STRING: 「――Is there anything else you're not telling us?」

LABEL: 0x3C68
STRING: 「There isn't.」

LABEL: 0x3C84
STRING: 「――Nothing.」

LABEL: 0x3CB8
STRING: I said it clearly.

LABEL: 0x3CD6
STRING: I thought I needed to be clear because I had repeatedly given vague answers to them.

LABEL: 0x3D9C
STRING: 「Is that the truth?」

LABEL: 0x3DC1
STRING: Hiragino asked me to reconfirm, and I nodded.

LABEL: 0x3EC4
STRING: 「I understand.」

LABEL: 0x3F41
STRING: 「So... Should I call you Katagiri-kun from now on?」

LABEL: 0x3F92
STRING: It had a familiar weight to it.

LABEL: 0x3FB4
STRING: A familiar name.

LABEL: 0x3FCE
STRING: 「Yes... That would be great.」

LABEL: 0x4009
STRING: 「So, Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x4029
STRING: 「I'll return this to you for now.」

LABEL: 0x4094
STRING: Hiragino then pulled out the pendant from his pocket and put it in my hand.

LABEL: 0x40F0
STRING: The engraving shined on the silver coin.

LABEL: 0x4186
STRING: 「It's important to you, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x41DE
STRING: 「...Was it a gift?」

LABEL: 0x420B
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x4234
STRING: 「...Your sister?」

LABEL: 0x425B
STRING: I answered him silently.

LABEL: 0x42EF
STRING: And then, I quietly closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x4317
STRING: The scene that appeared before me was one that I had seen many times.

LABEL: 0x4349
STRING: My sister holding the pendant――

LABEL: 0x4375
STRING: Her smile――

LABEL: 0x444F
STRING: 「...Don't lose it again.」

LABEL: 0x4478
STRING: 「Yeah, I won't.」

LABEL: 0x449A
STRING: I clutched the pendant tightly.

LABEL: 0x44D0
STRING: Hiragino smiled when he saw it, but only for a moment.

LABEL: 0x4582
STRING: 「Now then.」

LABEL: 0x45BD
STRING: He turned toward Yukari, frowning.

LABEL: 0x46C4
STRING: 「Momoi, don't be so mad, either.」

LABEL: 0x4762
STRING: 「...I'm not angry anymore.」

LABEL: 0x478D
STRING: She sighed heavily.

LABEL: 0x47B1
STRING: Hiragino faced her sullen expression.

LABEL: 0x484F
STRING: 「Listen carefully, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x487B
STRING: 「Usually, you wouldn't get so angry over something like that.」

LABEL: 0x48C1
STRING: 「After all that's happened since yesterday, you must have a lot on your mind too.」

LABEL: 0x4919
STRING: 「But that doesn't mean you have to take on everything by yourself.」

LABEL: 0x49C1
STRING: 「But, I'm in charge――」

LABEL: 0x49F6
STRING: 「That's just under normal circumstances, right?」

LABEL: 0x4A28
STRING: 「And you're right. This is an emergency.」

LABEL: 0x4A54
STRING: 「If you leave all the decisions to one person at a time like this, no matter how good they are, they'll break down sooner or later.」

LABEL: 0x4B1E
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x4B4F
STRING: 「You didn't sleep a wink yesterday, did you?」

LABEL: 0x4B94
STRING: 「...I did.」

LABEL: 0x4BC1
STRING: 「Where?」

LABEL: 0x4C49
STRING: 「I... There, in the guest room.」

LABEL: 0x4C84
STRING: 「You're lying.」

LABEL: 0x4C9C
STRING: 「That's where I slept.」

LABEL: 0x4D4D
STRING: Yukari opened her mouth to answer him, but ground her teeth, unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0x4DA1
STRING: Now it was Hiragino's turn to sigh as Yukari looked away in frustration.

LABEL: 0x4E4F
STRING: 「I know you're pushing yourself, so get some rest.」

LABEL: 0x4F77
STRING: 「Didn't they teach you that doctor's orders are absolute in a situation like this?」

LABEL: 0x4FC6
STRING: In a confined submarine, the judgment of medical professionals was absolute.

LABEL: 0x500C
STRING: Each person played an important role in the operation of a submarine, and fatigue or poor physical condition could lead to a serious accident if a mistake was made.

LABEL: 0x507C
STRING: It was also the attendants' duty to follow the doctor's decisions.

LABEL: 0x50EA
STRING: Yukari was no exception.

LABEL: 0x5116
STRING: In that sense, Hiragino was the only one who could command her.

LABEL: 0x51D0
STRING: 「Besides, communications with the surface won't be restored until 13:00...」

LABEL: 0x520C
STRING: 「Nothing can be done until then, right?」

LABEL: 0x529B
STRING: 「――Right, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x52D0
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x52E6
STRING: I stood up straight as my name was suddenly called.

LABEL: 0x5316
STRING: I had spent only a day under a false name.

LABEL: 0x5346
STRING: Nevertheless, when Hiragino called me "Katagiri," I was inevitably at a loss for a moment.

LABEL: 0x53AE
STRING: 「Y-Yes.」

LABEL: 0x53C8
STRING: 「The most we can do until then is explore the ship...」

LABEL: 0x54D5
STRING: 「――And that's why...」

LABEL: 0x54F7
STRING: 「What are you going to do if you're in a useless state when it comes time to make contact with the surface?」

LABEL: 0x55DA
STRING: Yukari still looked unconvinced.

LABEL: 0x5602
STRING: Across from her, Hiragino bent his waist to look at her.

LABEL: 0x56AE
STRING: 「Momoi, you're doing better than you realize.」

LABEL: 0x56F0
STRING: 「Everyone here, including me, trusts you.」

LABEL: 0x572E
STRING: 「That's why I'm worried about you and wish you'd rely on us more.」

LABEL: 0x57A9
STRING: Everyone nodded their heads in agreement to his kind words.

LABEL: 0x57F3
STRING: I wonder if I would be here now without Yukari, without the chaos.

LABEL: 0x5843
STRING: She looked around at us and slowly nodded.

LABEL: 0x58E7
STRING: 「...I get it.」

LABEL: 0x5909
STRING: 「I'll go rest for a bit, but...」

LABEL: 0x599A
STRING: 「If something happens, make sure to wake me up.」

LABEL: 0x59D8
STRING: 「Just promise me that.」

LABEL: 0x5A11
STRING: 「Yeah, sure.」

LABEL: 0x5A9D
STRING: 「Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x5AC8
STRING: 「Um... Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x5AE8
STRING: I found myself calling out to Yukari as she bowed her head and turned to leave.

LABEL: 0x5B9A
STRING: 「What is it... Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x5BCB
STRING: She looked at me suspiciously.

LABEL: 0x5BE7
STRING: I had to ask her about my sister.

LABEL: 0x5C11
STRING: I was sure she knew something.

LABEL: 0x5C43
STRING: Anything was fine.

LABEL: 0x5C5D
STRING: I wanted her to tell me something about my sister that I didn't know, no matter how trivial it might be.

LABEL: 0x5CB3
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x5CE5
STRING: 「Take your time. Get some rest.」

LABEL: 0x5D87
STRING: Huh...」

LABEL: 0x5DFC
STRING: 「Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x5E27
STRING: Yukari tilted her head at me curiously.

LABEL: 0x5E4F
STRING: I'd love to ask about my sister, but... for now, I probably shouldn't pursue that.

LABEL: 0x5EA9
STRING: She didn't even seem to accept the fact that I was her brother at the moment.

LABEL: 0x5F0F
STRING: We would have time to talk after she had rested.

LABEL: 0x5F73
STRING: Yukari bowed and left the lobby.

LABEL: 0x602D
STRING: 「I wonder if she'll have a proper rest...」

LABEL: 0x6062
STRING: 「...You don't think she's going to the wheelhouse again?」

LABEL: 0x60A9
STRING: 「No... By the look of it, she'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x60F6
STRING: Hiragino muttered while looking in the direction Yukari had just left.

LABEL: 0x61F9
STRING: 「She's a professional, after all.」

LABEL: 0x6231
STRING: 「She's probably noticed the decline in her own state as well.」

LABEL: 0x6271
STRING: 「So, taking a break is the rational thing to do.」

LABEL: 0x62A9
STRING: 「She's smart enough to understand that, she is.」

LABEL: 0x62F0
STRING: Hiragino's tone was a bit rough, but...

LABEL: 0x6330
STRING: I thought I heard his trust in her in it.

LABEL: 0x63A0
STRING: ...Hmm, wait?

LABEL: 0x63BE
STRING: 「...Come to think of it, weren't you sleeping in the emergency room?」

LABEL: 0x6476
STRING: 「Of course.」

LABEL: 0x6495
STRING: 「...You said you'd slept in that room just now.」

LABEL: 0x64D8
STRING: 「I lied.」

LABEL: 0x64F3
STRING: ...Who was it again that cross-examined me if I was lying or not a short while ago?

LABEL: 0x6545
STRING: Hiragino popped a xylitol tablet into his mouth with a smug look.

LABEL: 0x65F1
STRING: 「First of all, I came down from the third floor this morning.」

LABEL: 0x662B
STRING: 「Sleeping on the second floor was a lie, no matter how you look at it.」

LABEL: 0x6666
STRING: Right.

LABEL: 0x6680
STRING: So that was it... But, you know...

LABEL: 0x66BA
STRING: That was where he was wrong to be so smug.

LABEL: 0x66F0
STRING: ...This guy didn't think much, did he?

LABEL: 0x672E
STRING: The words he had persuaded Yukari with turned out to be false.

LABEL: 0x676A
STRING: ――Still, Hiragino exhaled calmly.

LABEL: 0x6806
STRING: 「She's not the type to fall for this kind of trick normally...」

LABEL: 0x6848
STRING: 「It must be proof that her mental state has degraded due to lack of sleep and fatigue... She's been pushing herself.」

LABEL: 0x6899
STRING: Hiragino said in a lonely tone, staring into empty space.

LABEL: 0x6939
STRING: 「And if you all haven't had enough rest yet, take a break.」

LABEL: 0x6998
STRING: With that said, Hiragino sat on the sofa and threw his long, slender legs out.

LABEL: 0x69DE
STRING: ...Damn it.

LABEL: 0x69F8
STRING: Stop showing off...

LABEL: 0x6AA9
STRING: Touri looked down at my keycard, which was still in her hand.

LABEL: 0x6AEB
STRING: It seemed like she remembered Reiri again.

LABEL: 0x6B83
STRING: 「I'm gonna go check on her.」

LABEL: 0x6BCC
STRING: She ran off with the keycard in hand.

LABEL: 0x6CBC
STRING: Her footsteps were seen off by me, Hiragino, and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x6D09
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun, Katagiri-kun and me... What a rare combination.」

LABEL: 0x6D50
STRING: 「Not really.」

LABEL: 0x6D72
STRING: 「Weren't we together yesterday too...? Right, Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x6D9E
STRING: I asked for Tokiwa's input.

LABEL: 0x6DFA
STRING: ...But no reply came back.

LABEL: 0x6E85
STRING: 「Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0x6EB7
STRING: She didn't answer me.

LABEL: 0x6ED7
STRING: 「...To-Tokiwa-san?」

LABEL: 0x6F2B
STRING: 「Tokki?」

LABEL: 0x6FA2
STRING: I went around Tokiwa's field of vision and called out to her, but she just averted her eyes.

LABEL: 0x700E
STRING: This wasn't a case of not being heard or anything like that.

LABEL: 0x7040
STRING: She was clearly ignoring me.

LABEL: 0x7060
STRING: Did I offend her in some way?

LABEL: 0x7086
STRING: Unlike Yukari, was there any reason for her to be so angry with me?

LABEL: 0x7148
STRING: 「Oh no. I just said it myself.」

LABEL: 0x7186
STRING: 「And now I've let Touri-kun go alone...」

LABEL: 0x71C3
STRING: 「Ah!」

LABEL: 0x71DB
STRING: His words reminded me that someone or something might be lurking within this ship.

LABEL: 0x7221
STRING: 「We should hurry after her――」

LABEL: 0x725A
STRING: 「That doesn't seem to be necessary.」

LABEL: 0x72AD
STRING: ...Tap, tap, tap, tap.

LABEL: 0x72D1
STRING: The sound of footsteps approached the quiet lobby.

LABEL: 0x73A0
STRING: Touri breathed heavily with her hands on her knees.

LABEL: 0x73D6
STRING: Why was she in such a hurry...?

LABEL: 0x73FC
STRING: Don't tell me...

LABEL: 0x7414
STRING: My doubts turned into a bad premonition quickly.

LABEL: 0x7440
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x74E6
STRING: 「...Reiri... wasn't there.」

LABEL: 0x7517
STRING: That premonition turned into reality.
